U

update(int, int, String, boolean) - Method in class clueClient.BoardModel
Purpose: Method takes in a coordinate pair and an unparsed method and performs the specified update directed in updateMessage parameter.
update(int[], String) - Method in class clueServer.Users
Purpose: Update Client game state via client socket in appropriate player(s).
updateAll(String) - Method in class clueServer.Users
Purpose: Update Client game state via client socket in all player(s).
UpdateState - Class in clueNetwork
Deprecated. Class semantics and roles:
This class represents the payload of data on a socket.
It is used to shuttle information back and forth between two socket connection endpoints.
The main usage is no defined yet.

Information maintenance:
Creation: The object is created when passing some data on the socket
Deletion: the object is destroyed after receipt by the destination socket endpoint
UpdateState() - Constructor for class clueNetwork.UpdateState
Deprecated.  
UserManagementComponentsTest - Class in testPages
Class semantics and roles:
This class is used to test the unification of the following objects:
- Player
- ServerListener
- Users
- ClientSocket (via Player)
UserManagementComponentsTest() - Constructor for class testPages.UserManagementComponentsTest

Purpose: construct the thread and assign username
username - Variable in class clueClient.Client
the username of the gamer for this Client
username - Variable in class testPages.ClientMessagePassingTestClient
 
username - Variable in class testPages.UserManagementComponentsTestClient.ClientThread
username for this thread to write to server
users - Variable in class clueServer.Player
The Users class that contains a reference to this Player object in its Players array
users - Variable in class clueServer.Server
reference to the Users object: a collection of players
users - Variable in class clueServer.ServerListener
A Back reference to the Users class for Player creation and addition
Users - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
The Users class is responsible for maintaining references to all of the Player objects.
Users(Server) - Constructor for class clueServer.Users
Default Constructor:
Takes 0 arguments.
usersCount() - Method in class clueServer.Users
Purpose: Get the number of Player objects currently maintained by the Users class

Preconditions: There are objects in array
Postconditions: the number of non-null elements is known
Pseudo-Code:
FOR all elements in player array:
--> IF the current element is not null:
--> --> increment the number of players by 1
return the number of players
END
(Added 19 NOV 2008, Michael Philippone)
Utilities - Class in utils
This is a collection of static methods and properties (read: global constants) that I was finding useful to include several times, so I unified the access point(s) for them.
Utilities() - Constructor for class utils.Utilities
 
Utilities.e_ExitCode - Enum in utils
Enum of possible system exit status codes

utils - package utils
